title: Victor's Emblem
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/YuNgG0Ha-victors-emblem
Found topic at NA, but didn't found an answer to this bothering question: What will be the winner's icon? Is it the icon that is already in-game and can be purchased by order/chaos tokens or is it a new not announced by now icon?

replies.body: The icon that will be crafted from the Victor's Emblem is not available yet.  How that icon will look depends on the who wins!  Once we have that winner, you'll be able to craft it into their special icon.  :D
So you're deciding which icon should win or we are doing it? Like voting and that?

Included:

We all get to decide which side gets an icon.
That depends on the missions we do ( Either Chaos or Order, playing Yasuo vs Riven and win and vice versa. )

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5tLyaZda,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-17T20:45:46.071+0000)
>
> The icon that will be crafted from the Victor's Emblem is not available yet.  How that icon will look depends on the who wins!  Once we have that winner, you'll be able to craft it into their special icon.  :D

This doesnt have much to do with the victor icon but everytime i click my orb of chaos or my chaos tokens my client closes out of the loot page :/

use the repair tool to see if that fixes it .... if not then use the report a bug option at the bottom left corner of the client 

hopefully they fix it before the event ends if its a bug on their end
I'd guess it's based on what icons we chose and how many order/chaos missions we did.
